text: If there’s a 10 start i would give… this Is a “Toys R Us” of marine hobby, There’s no other LFS Marine shop better then this, they gave top customer service & Everyone from the boss Razali to his staff Nasrul & Marcus, been a great help to guide me through.. give me top advise on taking care n maintaining,  i end up buying a custom marine tank at a very good price, what i like, all prices have price tag include life stock, , all their products price are reasonable as compare to other marine LFS. Overall, this a go to place for all marine/reef tank needs..
They are well reputed marine aquarium dealers and distributes
